name: FLATLANDERS
description:
FLATLANDERS is a eerie aesthetic action packed puzzle game where you try to go through a strange dystopian like laboratory / morgue as you try to find a way out.

Wonder around this eerie place and try to figure out what is going on, from the bubbling lava to the slanting rooms that will tilt your brain.

Featuring:

o Lasers

o Bullets

o Box's

o A.I

o Lava

o Fire

o Some sort of glass

o Wind tunnels

o And much more!

(More levels to come in the following weeks).
